problem.p: Four rocks are thrown horizontally from a building, with varying speeds and from various floors. Rock 1 lands a distance r away from the building, rock 2 lands 2r away from the building, rock 3 lands at distance 3r, and rock 4 at 4r. Ignore air resistance.
Drag the rocks into place to select the rock that was thrown with the height and speed shown. You will use the "no rock" answer more than once.

customresponse.answer:
correct_answer = [ {'draggables': ['rock1'], 'targets': ['vh'], 'rule':'anyof' }, {'draggables': ['rock2'], 'targets': ['2vh'], 'rule':'anyof' }, {'draggables': ['norock'], 'targets': ['v2h','2v2h','v3h','v6h'], 'rule':'unordered_equal' }, {'draggables': ['rock4'], 'targets': ['2v4h'], 'rule':'anyof' }, {'draggables': ['rock3'], 'targets': ['v9h'], 'rule':'anyof' }]
if draganddrop.grade(submission[0], correct_answer): correct = ['correct'] else: correct = ['incorrect']
